TopicTitle: Craft self-destructs when player is 10 km away. Why?

Articles.Content: Title said it all. I tried to make a defender for KSC, but the defender craft breaks apart when my craft (bomber) goes 12 km away. Why is that? Game issue or mod issue?
It's the game. It base a "debris deletion system," which destroys anything on Kerbin that is over 10 KM away
There are mods that increase the physics loading range. I believe its either built into BDarmory or part of a recommended mod
